column1: Gongs are evil beings that appear in The Book of Lost Tales
column2: the earliest version of what would become The Silmarillion. In his commentary
column3: Christopher Tolkien remarks that they are obscurely related to Orcs
column4: perhaps as a sub-race of the species. There are no references to Gongs in J.R.R. Tolkiens later legendarium and the author appears to have abandoned the concept.

column1: The Gnomish word sithagong is glossed as "dragonfly" (sitha being the word for flies).
